verses.text: \w Wherefore|strong="G3606"\w*, \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w partakers|strong="G3353"\w* of the \w heavenly|strong="G2032"\w* \w calling|strong="G2821"\w*, \w consider|strong="G2657"\w* the \w Apostle|strong="G0652"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* High \w Priest|strong="G0749"\w* \w of|strong="G3671"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w profession|strong="G3671"\w*, \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*;

Who \w was|strong="G5607"\w* \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w* to him that \w appointed|strong="G4160"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w* \add was faithful\add* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3650"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w house|strong="G3624"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \add man\add* was counted \w worthy|strong="G0515"\w* \w of|strong="G1391"\w* \w more|strong="G4119"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w than|strong="G3844"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w*, \w in|strong="G2596"\w*asmuch \w as|strong="G3745"\w* he who hath \w builded|strong="G2680"\w* the \w house|strong="G0846"\w* \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* \w more|strong="G4119"\w* \w honour|strong="G5092"\w* than the \w house|strong="G3624"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w house|strong="G3624"\w* is \w builded|strong="G2680"\w* \w by|strong="G5259"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \add man\add*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* he that \w built|strong="G2680"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \add is\add* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w* \w verily|strong="G3303"\w* \add was\add* \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3650"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w house|strong="G3624"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* a \w servant|strong="G2324"\w*, \w for|strong="G1519"\w* a \w testimony|strong="G3142"\w* of those things which were to be spoken \w after|strong="G2980"\w*;

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* a \w son|strong="G5207"\w* \w over|strong="G1909"\w* his \w own|strong="G0846"\w* \w house|strong="G3624"\w*; \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w house|strong="G3624"\w* are \w we|strong="G2070"\w*, \w if|strong="G1437"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* hold \w fast|strong="G2722"\w* the \w confidence|strong="G3954"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w rejoicing|strong="G2745"\w* of the \w hope|strong="G1680"\w* \w firm|strong="G0949"\w* \w unto|strong="G3360"\w* the \w end|strong="G5056"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G1352"\w* (\w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w the|strong="G4151"\w* \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w*, To \w day|strong="G4594"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* ye will \w hear|strong="G0191"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w*,

\w Harden|strong="G4645"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w provocation|strong="G3894"\w*, \w in|strong="G2596"\w* the \w day|strong="G2250"\w* of \w temptation|strong="G3986"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w wilderness|strong="G2048"\w*:

\w When|strong="G3757"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w fathers|strong="G3962"\w* \w tempted|strong="G3985"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w*, \w proved|strong="G1381"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w* \w forty|strong="G5062"\w* \w years|strong="G2094"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G1352"\w* I was grieved \w with|strong="G4360"\w* \w that|strong="G1565"\w* \w generation|strong="G1074"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, They \w do|strong="G4105"\w* \w alway|strong="G0104"\w* \w err|strong="G4105"\w* \w in|strong="G2588"\w* \add their\add* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w have|strong="G1097"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w known|strong="G1097"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w ways|strong="G3598"\w*.

\w So|strong="G5613"\w* I \w sware|strong="G3660"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w wrath|strong="G3709"\w*, They \w shall|strong="G1525"\w* \w not|strong="G1487"\w* \w enter|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w rest|strong="G2663"\w*.)

Take \w heed|strong="G0991"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w lest|strong="G3379"\w* there \w be|strong="G2071"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* of \w you|strong="G5216"\w* \w an|strong="G2588"\w* \w evil|strong="G4190"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w* of \w unbelief|strong="G0570"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w departing|strong="G0868"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w living|strong="G2198"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w exhort|strong="G3870"\w* one \w another|strong="G1438"\w* \w daily|strong="G2250"\w*, \w while|strong="G0891"\w* it is \w called|strong="G2564"\w* To \w day|strong="G4594"\w*; \w lest|strong="G2443"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w* be \w hardened|strong="G4645"\w* through the \w deceitfulness|strong="G0539"\w* of \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* we are \w made|strong="G1096"\w* \w partakers|strong="G3353"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w if|strong="G1437"\w* we \w hold|strong="G2722"\w* the \w beginning|strong="G0746"\w* of our \w confidence|strong="G5287"\w* \w stedfast|strong="G0949"\w* \w unto|strong="G3360"\w* the \w end|strong="G5056"\w*;

\w While|strong="G1722"\w* it is \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, To \w day|strong="G4594"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* ye will \w hear|strong="G0191"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w*, \w harden|strong="G4645"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w provocation|strong="G3894"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w*, when they had \w heard|strong="G0191"\w*, did \w provoke|strong="G3893"\w*: \w howbeit|strong="G0235"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* that \w came|strong="G1831"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w Egypt|strong="G0125"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* with \w whom|strong="G5101"\w* was he \w grieved|strong="G4360"\w* \w forty|strong="G5062"\w* \w years|strong="G2094"\w*? \add was it\add* \w not|strong="G3780"\w* with them that had \w sinned|strong="G0264"\w*, \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w carcases|strong="G2966"\w* \w fell|strong="G4098"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w wilderness|strong="G2048"\w*?

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* to \w whom|strong="G5101"\w* sware \w he|strong="G3660"\w* \w that|strong="G3361"\w* they \w should|strong="G1525"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w enter|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w rest|strong="G2663"\w*, \w but|strong="G1487"\w* to them that believed \w not|strong="G0544"\w*?

\w So|strong="G2532"\w* we \w see|strong="G0991"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* they \w could|strong="G1410"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* enter \w in|strong="G1525"\w* because \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w unbelief|strong="G0570"\w*.
